summary: Small mod that adds some bat files that allow you to have a static camera for video purposes
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Small mod that adds some bat files that allow you to have a static camera for video purposes

Installation:
Put the folder "Batch_Files" into your main skyrim directory.
[color=#ffff00]*Yes you have to have the "Batch_Files" folder in there because of how this mod is setup I will explain why in the how to use section*[/color]

Uninstallation:
Remove the "Batch_Files" folder from your main skyrim directory

How to use:
1. When your in the game use the console and type *Bat "Batch_Files\Static_Camera\Step_1"* This will duplicate your player.
2. With the console select the duplicate of yourself and go into third person and type *Bat "Batch_Files\Static_Camera\Step_2"* into the console window
[color=#ffff00]
[/color]3. When you are done with the static camera typeÂ *Bat "Batch_Files\Static_Camera\Step_3"* into the console and it will run the "Step_3" and automatically runs the "Step_4" bat file. [color=#ffff00]*This is why you need the "Batch_Files" folder into the main skyrim directory[/color][/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
